model

Interface Accounts

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    Account401K, Account403B, AccountCashBalance, AccountIra, AccountRoth, Brokerage, SavingsModel

    public interface Accounts
    Define an interface for an Account object.
    Version:
    release-1.0.0 Initial version
    Author:
    D.K.Sweeney 1/12/2016

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void deposit(int currentAge, double deposit)
      Deposit an amount and recompute the balance for the remaining years.
      boolean isTaxable()
      Returns the taxable status of the account.
      double withdraw(int currentAge, double amount)
      Withdraw a certain amount if the account has amount in it.

    • Method Detail

      • deposit

        void deposit(int currentAge,
             double deposit)
        Deposit an amount and recompute the balance for the remaining years.
        Parameters:
        currentAge - The age of the person at the deposit year
        deposit - The amount of the deposit

      • withdraw

        double withdraw(int currentAge,
                double amount)
        Withdraw a certain amount if the account has amount in it.
        Parameters:
        currentAge - The age of the person at the withdrawal year
        amount - The requested amount of the withdrawal
        Returns:
        The amount actually withdrawn

      • isTaxable

        boolean isTaxable()
        Returns the taxable status of the account.
        Returns:
        boolean
